name: Tackle Tourney TURBO
description:
Try to catch your friends in a fishing free-for-all without getting caught yourself!

Local multiplayer game for 2-4 players. Playing with gamepads is recommended and required for 3-4 players.

Controls Gamepad

Movement: left analog stick or D-pad
Grab fishing line: A button

Keyboard (Player 1, Player 2)

Movement: WASD, IJKL
Grab fishing line: E, O
Fullscreen: F
Mute: M

Made for #FishingJam 2 with Pixi.js. Uses the PICO-8 colour palette.
